channel.title: Homeworks on Parasitology
channel.description: Recent content in Homeworks on Parasitology

item.title: Module 4 homework
item.description: 1 Calculate $R_0$ for a pathogen with transmission rate of 0.5 and recovery rate of 0.4, assuming $SIR$ style dynamics. What happens to $R_0$ when we introduce an exposed class and set the transition from exposed to infected ($\omega$) to be 0.6? 2 Add vaccination into the SEIR model as presented in the lecture notes, show how to format the F and V matrices for the next-generation method of estimating $R_0$, and estimate $R_0$ given the parameters $\beta$ = 1.
